titles.title: To designate the United States Customs Administrative Building at the Ysleta/Zaragosa Port of Entry located at 797 South Ysleta in El Paso, Texas, as the "Timothy C. McCaghren Customs Administrative Building".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure.
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means. (Referral Suspended).
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Mr. Gilchrest asked unanimous consent that the Committee on Ways and Means be discharged from consideration of the bill and that the bill be rereferred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. Agreed to without objection.
Committee on Ways and Means discharged.
Referred to the House Committee on Transportation.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.
Subcommittee Hearings Held.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 104-415.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 158.

action.text: Mr. Gilchrest moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Chafee without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 357.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 12/18/1995--Passed House amended. Designates the United States Customs Administrative Building at the Ysleta-Zaragosa Port of Entry located at 797 South Zaragosa Road in El Paso, Texas, as the Timothy C. McCaghren Customs Administrative Building.
